plot: A ten-year-old boy begins screaming in pain, but nobody knows why, because he is autistic and cannot explain. House refuses to use his office because it has new carpet.

House meets a young boy with Autism named Adam. Plagued with the inability to communicate verbally with the child, House must find other ways to communicate. Lastly, House has a young 17-year-old girl who is in love with him following him around. Cuddy demands that he puts an end to it.—Alexander Edmunds
